TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TrackingProfile extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 定义根工作流实例的可能执行路径中的关注点，应将有关该关注点的信息通知跟踪服务。

span.span: Defines points of interest in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance about which a tracking service should be notified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流实例在运行时期间会将跟踪事件发出到运行时跟踪基础结构。During its run time, a workflow instance emits tracking events to the runtime tracking infrastructure. 运行时跟踪基础结构使用 筛选这些跟踪事件，并基于此筛选将跟踪记录返回到跟踪服务。The runtime tracking infrastructure uses a to filter these tracking events and returns tracking records based on this filtering to a tracking service. 有三种可以筛选的跟踪事件：活动状态事件、工作流状态事件以及用户事件。There are three kinds of tracking events that can be filtered: activity status events, workflow status events, and user events. 您可以将 对象添加到 属性以匹配特定的活动状态事件；将 对象添加到 属性以匹配特定的工作流状态事件；并将 对象添加到 属性以匹配特定的用户事件。You can add objects to the property to match specific activity status events; objects to the property to match specific workflow status events; and objects to the property to match specific user events. 匹配了跟踪点后，运行时跟踪基础结构将通过与跟踪服务关联的 将与跟踪事件关联的数据返回到该跟踪服务。When a track point is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure returns the data associated with the tracking event to the tracking service over the associated with that service. 数据将在 、 或 中返回，具体情况取决于匹配的跟踪点的类型。The data is returned in either an , a , or a depending on the type of track point that was matched. 跟踪服务在抽象 类中实现方法以提供功能，供运行时跟踪基础结构请求与服务关联的 ，以及与特定工作流实例或特定工作流类型关联的 。A tracking service implements the methods in the abstract class to provide the functionality for the runtime tracking infrastructure to request a associated with the service, and a associated with a particular workflow instance or with a particular workflow type. 跟踪服务还必须实现抽象 类以提供通道，运行时跟踪基础结构可以通过该通道发送跟踪记录。A tracking service must also implement the abstract class to provide the channel over which the runtime tracking infrastructure can send tracking records. 当跟踪服务将跟踪配置文件对象返回到运行库时，工作流将开始执行，并对跟踪配置文件进行序列化。When the tracking service returns a tracking profile object to the runtime, the workflow starts to execute, and the tracking profile is serialized. 如果跟踪配置文件的序列化失败，则会将一个异常引发到工作流实例。If the serialization of the tracking profile fails, an exception is raised to the workflow instance. 如果异常未得到处理，工作流实例将终止。If the exception is not handled, the workflow instance is terminated. 在将跟踪配置文件传递到运行库之前，可以使用 属性对其进行验证。The tracking profile can be validated before passing it to the runtime using the property. 可以使用 （它将依据 设置 XML 格式）将 序列化为 XML。A can be serialized to XML by using the , which formats the XML according to the . 这样就为配置文件存储和以非编程方式编写配置文件提供了一种方便的格式。This provides a convenient format for profile storage and for authoring a profile in a non-programmatic manner. 例如，SQL 跟踪服务存储其跟踪配置文件的序列化版本，您基于 类创建的任何跟踪服务也同样如此。For example, the SQL Tracking Service stores serialized versions of its tracking profiles, as will any tracking service you create based on the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数创建 ，以及如何使用对象的属性来帮助跟踪工作流的执行。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a using the constructor and use the object's properties to help track the execution of a workflow. 该示例代码使用 、 和 属性。The example code uses the , , and properties. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“使用 SQLTrackingService 查询”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 SQLTrackingService 查询](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742042(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742042(v=vs.90)). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#291](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#291)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#291](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#291)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数会初始化一个空的 。The constructor initializes an empty . 您可以将跟踪点添加到 、 和 以配置 。You can add track points to , , and to configure the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数创建 ，以及如何使用对象的属性来帮助跟踪工作流的执行。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a using the constructor and use the object's properties to help track the execution of a workflow. 该示例代码使用 、 和 属性。The example code uses the , , and properties. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“使用 SQLTrackingService 查询”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 SQLTrackingService 查询](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742042(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742042(v=vs.90)). MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ActivityTrackPoints As ActivityTrackPointCollection

summary.span: 获取运行时跟踪基础结构用于筛选活动状态事件的活动跟踪点的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of activity track points used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to filter activity status events.

value.span: 一个指定工作流实例中各个点的 ，运行时跟踪基础结构应为该工作流实例将 发送到跟踪服务。

span.span: An that specifies the points in a workflow instance for which the runtime tracking infrastructure should send an to the tracking service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当活动实例的 发生更改时，工作流实例会将活动状态事件发出到运行时跟踪基础结构。A workflow instance emits activity status events to the runtime tracking infrastructure whenever the of an activity instance changes. 运行时跟踪基础结构使用 属性筛选这些活动状态事件，以确定何时将 发送到跟踪服务。The runtime tracking infrastructure uses the property to filter these activity status events to determine when to send an to the tracking service. 您可以将 添加到 属性，以指定工作流实例的可能执行路径中的关注点，您想要运行时基础结构为该工作流实例发送一个 。You can add an to the property to specify points of interest in the potential execution path of the workflow instance for which you want the runtime infrastructure to send an . 不会实际在工作流实例中定义一个物理点，而是会定义一组匹配参数，运行时跟踪基础结构可以使用这些参数来匹配应为其发送 的活动状态事件。An does not actually define a physical point in a workflow instance, but instead defines a set of match parameters that can be used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match an activity status event for which it should send an . 因此，在工作流实例的生存期内，可以匹配同一个 多次。Therefore, the same can be matched many times during the lifespan of a workflow instance. 还可以指定要从工作流实例中提取并在 中返回的数据。An can also specify data to be extracted from the workflow instance and returned in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数创建 ，以及如何使用对象的属性来帮助跟踪工作流的执行。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a using the constructor and use the object's properties to help track the execution of a workflow. 该示例代码使用 、 和 属性。The example code uses the , , and properties. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“使用 SQLTrackingService 查询”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 SQLTrackingService 查询](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742042(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742042(v=vs.90)). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#291](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#291)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#291](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#291)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserTrackPoints As UserTrackPointCollection

summary.span: 获取运行时跟踪基础结构用于筛选用户事件的用户跟踪点的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of user track points used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to filter user events.

value.span: 一个指定工作流实例中各个点的 ，运行时跟踪基础结构应为该工作流实例将 发送到跟踪服务。

span.span: A that specifies the points in a workflow instance for which the runtime tracking infrastructure should send a to the tracking service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流设计器或活动设计器可以使用 、、 或 来检测工作流或活动，以便在工作流执行期间将数据发出到运行时跟踪基础结构的特定点。A workflow designer or an activity designer can use , , , or to instrument a workflow or an activity to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure at specific points during the execution of a workflow. 这种事件称为用户事件，而发出的数据称为用户数据。Such an occurrence is called a user event and the data emitted is called user data. 运行时跟踪基础结构使用 属性筛选用户事件，以确定何时将 发送到跟踪服务。The runtime tracking infrastructure uses the property to filter user events to determine when to send a to the tracking service. 您可以将 添加到 属性，以指定想要为其发送 的工作流实例的可能执行路径中的关注点。You can add a to the property to specify points of interest in the potential execution path of the workflow instance for which you want a sent. 不会实际在工作流实例中定义一个物理点，而是会定义一组匹配参数，运行时跟踪基础结构可以使用这些参数来匹配用户事件。A does not actually define a physical point in a workflow instance, but instead defines a set of match parameters that can be used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match user events. 因此，在工作流实例的生存期内，可以匹配同一个 多次。Therefore, the same can be matched many times during the lifespan of a workflow instance. 运行时跟踪基础结构将始终在 中返回与匹配 关联的用户数据，但 也可以指定要从工作流实例中提取并在跟踪记录中返回的数据。The runtime tracking infrastructure always returns the user data associated with a matched in the , but a can also specify data to be extracted from the workflow instance and returned in the tracking record.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Version ^ Version { Version ^ get(); void set(Version ^ value); };
member this.Version : Version with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置跟踪配置文件的版本。

span.span: Gets or sets the version of the tracking profile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于工作流运行时引擎中配置文件缓存的语义的原因，如果更改 的内容，您必须更新 。Because of the semantics of profile caching in the workflow runtime engine, if you change the contents of a you must update . 如果不更新，则工作流运行时引擎可能不会加载更新的 ，即使它是通过调用 返回的，或者在与 事件关联的 中发送的。If you do not, your updated may not be loaded by the workflow runtime engine, even if it is returned by a call to , or sent in the associated with a event. 因此，为了确保工作流运行时引擎加载更新的 ，您应为 更改 。Therefore, to ensure that the updated is loaded by the workflow runtime engine, you should change the for the . 您可以在任何适当的工作流实例上显式调用 ，或者，视实现而定，您可以依赖于跟踪服务将更改通知工作流运行时引擎。You can then explicitly call on any appropriate workflow instances, or, depending on your implementation, you can rely on the tracking service to inform the workflow runtime engine of the change. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数创建 ，以及如何使用对象的属性来帮助跟踪工作流的执行。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a using the constructor and use the object's properties to help track the execution of a workflow. 该示例代码使用 、 和 属性。The example code uses the , , and properties. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“使用 SQLTrackingService 查询”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 SQLTrackingService 查询](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742042(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742042(v=vs.90)). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#291](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#291)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#291](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#291)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WorkflowTrackPoints As WorkflowTrackPointCollection

summary.span: 获取运行时跟踪基础结构用于筛选工作流状态事件的工作流跟踪点的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of workflow track points used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to filter workflow status events.

value.span: 一个指定工作流实例中各个点的 ，运行时跟踪基础结构应为该工作流实例将 发送到跟踪服务。

span.span: A that specifies the points in a workflow instance for which the runtime tracking infrastructure should send a to the tracking service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当发生指示工作流实例状态已更改的 时，工作流实例会将工作流状态事件发出到运行时跟踪基础结构。A workflow instance emits workflow status events to the runtime tracking infrastructure whenever a occurs indicating that the status of a workflow instance has changed. 运行时跟踪基础结构使用 属性筛选这些工作流状态事件，以确定何时将 发送到跟踪服务。The runtime tracking infrastructure uses the property to filter these workflow status events to determine when to send a to the tracking service. 您可以将 添加到 属性，以指定想要为其发送 的工作流实例的可能执行路径中的关注点。You can add a to the property to specify points of interest in the potential execution path of the workflow instance for which you want a sent. 不会实际在工作流实例中定义一个物理点，而是会定义一个或多个 值，运行时跟踪基础结构可以使用这些值来匹配工作流状态事件。A does not actually define a physical point in a workflow instance, but instead defines one or more values that can be used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match workflow status events. 因此，在工作流实例的生存期内，可以匹配同一个 多次。Therefore, the same can be matched many times during the lifespan of a workflow instance. 也可以指定要在 中返回的任何批注。A can also specify any annotations to be returned in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数创建 ，以及如何使用对象的属性来帮助跟踪工作流的执行。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a using the constructor and use the object's properties to help track the execution of a workflow. 该示例代码使用 、 和 属性。The example code uses the , , and properties. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“使用 SQLTrackingService 查询”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Query using SQLTrackingService SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 SQLTrackingService 查询](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742042(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Query Using SQLTrackingService](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742042(v=vs.90)).
